name: Bianca
body:
### Bianca Project
Bianca is a fast, 100% Java implementation of the PHP language allowing
developers to use PHP flexibility for the web interface and Java for
stability.

Clever Cloud has forked the Quercus project, maintained and copyrighted by
Caucho Technology, to have a best response for issues fixing and features
requests. Quercus is a part of Caucho's project Resin.
tagline: Bianca is a fast, 100% Java implementation of the PHP language
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
